summary: Mirable, a redhead girl with green and freckels CME save slot.
descriptionHtml:
This is an ECE (Enhanced Character Editor) save slot for a character that I have imported and then modified to look like this. Exctract the file from the zip and copy it to your My DocumentsMy GamesSkyrimCME_Save directory. In order for you to make her look exactly like this will need all of the following mods:

Enhanced Character Edit: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?
ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?
DIMONIZED UNP female body: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?
ApachiiSkyHair: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
The Eyes Of Beauty: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?
Hale - Iridum Eyes: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30823/?
SG Female Textures Renewal: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?
SG Female Eyebrows: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?

Finally, there used to be an epic hairpack available on Nexus called SG Hairpack but the author have since removed it and is no longer available anywhere.

You can find some more characters here: Beautiful Girls for ECE: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51809/?
author: Donatello
